# turbine Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "turbine" {
  endpoint = "http://localhost:8000"
  username = "admin"
  password = "secret"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `endpoint` (String) Endpoint of Turbine API Server

### Optional

- `password` (String, Sensitive)
- `username` (String)
